title: Variables
summary: Variables store values so you can reuse and update them later. Each variable has a name and a value, and the program can read or change that value over time.
sample_question: What is a variable and why is it useful in programming?

title: Loops
summary: Loops let you repeat an action multiple times without copying the same code. They are useful when you want to process lists, count, or perform repeated checks.
sample_question: Explain the difference between a for loop and a while loop.
